<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.cxs_RPFltrConfig</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>The business logic for the cxs_rp_fltr_config table</description> <name>cxs_RPFltrConfig</name> <script><![CDATA[var cxs_RPFltrConfig = Class.create(); cxs_RPFltrConfig.prototype = Object.extendsObject(cxs_FltrConfig, {
